segments.text: Are you free this weekend , Miss Rose ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then would you please go to a dance party with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: With pleasure . I suppose you dance often .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , no . As a matter of fact , I haven't danced for a long time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I am told that you dance wonderfully well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks for flattering me . I think you dance a lot , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say , but I do love the foxtrot and waltz .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: To tell you the truth , I don't like it . It's too noisy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it's really beautiful , but I just can't do it well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't be so modest . I'm sure you can do it very well . Then I'll meet you at six . Is that at all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! I'm your lucky fellow then .
segments.speaker: S1
